from.S: rundown.location_history_rows l inner join rundown.location_history_rows r on l.location_id = r.location_id and ((l.row_num = r.row_num + 1 and l.combo_id <> r.combo_id) or (l.row_num = 1 and r.row_num = 1))

select.S: l.combo_id, l.location_id, l.oem_version, l.software_version, l.radar_serial, l.radar_model, l.radar_configuration, l.radar_measurement_mode, l.start_date, coalesce(lead(l.start_date) over (partition by l.location_id order by l.location_id, l.start_date),getdate()+1) as end_date, getdate() as date_processed
